product_name: The North Face Freedom LRBC Insulated Pants - Women's Short Sizes
long_description: Warm and waterproof, and boasting a modern fit with a short inseam, The North Face Freedom Low-Rise Boot-Cut insulated women's pants are ready for your winter adventures in the white stuff. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. 60g Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation helps keep your legs warm while you're romping about in the snow; insulation packs down easily for compact stowing of pants. Pants have a short inseam with a low-rise waist and boot-cut legs; fit is relaxed with articulated knees for excellent freedom of movement. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Zippered handwarmer pockets; single thigh cargo pocket with rip-and-stick flap. The North Face Freedom Low-Rise Boot-Cut Insulated women's pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
short_description: Warm and waterproof, and boasting a modern fit with a short inseam, The North Face Freedom Low-Rise Boot-Cut insulated women's pants are ready for your winter adventures in the white stuff.
